name: T - Emma Caroline
_source: speak;Caroline; Emma!{w} Thank the stars I found you both!
speak;Emma; Mom, we need your help! There's monsters and-
speak;Caroline; I know, honey.{w} Come on, let's kill these monsters and head home.{w} Sonia and the others are fending them off right now.
speak;Emma; They're fighting monsters too?!{w} Then we have to hurry!
